text: [Alice]: I was doing tasks in the cafeteria and saw several people there, including Bob and Dave who then went to Medbay - where has everyone else been?
[Erin]: I was in the cafeteria for a while and saw Alice, Dave, Bob, and Charlie doing tasks; Alice, did you notice anything unusual in Medbay after you and Dave left?

[Bob]: I was in the cafeteria too, and I can confirm seeing Alice, Erin, Dave, and Charlie doing tasks; after that, I went to Medbay, Alice, did you notice anything suspicious or any tasks being done?
[Charlie]: I was in the cafeteria with everyone and then went to Admin alone, so let's hear from Alice, Dave, and Bob about what happened in Medbay to gather more clues.

[Alice]: Since Dave's body was found in Medbay and Bob arrived just after me, I think we should focus on who wasn't accounted for during that time period - Charlie, you mentioned being alone in Admin, which seems convenient.
[Erin]: Alice, since you reported the body, can you clarify the sequence of events leading up to your discovery? Did you notice anyone acting suspiciously in or around Medbay?
[Bob]: Alice, can you clarify if you saw anyone else in Medbay before or after finding Dave's body, as it seems crucial to understanding what happened?
[Charlie]: I was in Admin alone after the cafeteria, so I'm curious if Bob saw anyone on his way to Medbay that might help us narrow down the suspect list.

[Alice]: I saw Dave enter Medbay first, then I followed shortly after, and when Bob arrived a few minutes later, Dave was already dead - this timeline puts Charlie's whereabouts into question since they were alone during this crucial period.
[Erin]: Let's piece together everyone's movements after leaving the cafeteria to see if there's a gap or inconsistency in someone's story, especially focusing on Charlie's time alone in Admin.

[Bob]: Let's focus on the timeline and see if anyone's story doesn't add up, especially considering the time Dave was found in Medbay, and Charlie, could you provide more details about your time in Admin and if you saw anyone else?

[Charlie]: I was in Admin alone after the cafeteria, and I didn't encounter anyone else there, which is why I'm asking if Bob saw anyone on his way to Medbay, as it might help us understand the movements better.
[Alice]: The fact that Charlie keeps insisting they were alone in Admin without any witnesses, while the rest of us can verify each other's locations, makes them extremely suspicious.
[Erin]: Charlie, can you explain why you chose to go to Admin alone when most of us were in the cafeteria or moving to Medbay, especially since your alibi seems to rely solely on your own word?
[Bob]: I didn't see anyone on my way to Medbay after leaving the cafeteria, which makes it difficult to confirm Charlie's claims of being alone in Admin.

[Charlie]: I understand why my being alone in Admin might seem suspicious, but I was simply following my task list; I completed the coffee maker task in the cafeteria and then moved to Admin to fix the wiring.
[Alice]: Charlie's story about following their task list seems awfully convenient, especially since they only mentioned these specific tasks after being questioned repeatedly about being alone.

[Erin]: Charlie, since your alibi relies solely on your own word, could you provide more details about the specific tasks you completed in Admin and in what order, to see if they align with our task lists?
[Bob]: Alice, since you were the one who reported the body, can you provide more details about the exact moment you found Dave's body and if there was anything unusual in Medbay?
[Charlie]: Alice, since you reported the body, can you clarify what tasks you completed in Medbay before finding Dave's body, and was there anything unusual or anyone else nearby at that time?
